## Introduction

`ConvQcENANDES` provides a complete set of tools for the **quality control**
of daily conventional meteorological data used in the ENANDES+ project.

## Workflow Example

```r
library(ConvQcENANDES)
df <- data.frame(
  fecha = format(seq(lubridate::dmy("01/01/2020"), lubridate::dmy("31/01/2020"), by="day"), "%d/%m/%Y"),
  valor = pmax(0, round(rnorm(31, 20, 10), 1))
)

d <- verificacion_formato(df, variable = 1, "01/01/2020", "31/01/2020")
d <- rango_logico(d, 0, 300, eliminar = FALSE)
d <- zscore_etiquetar(d, variable = 1, percentil = 0.99)
d <- isolation_forest_etiquetar(d, contaminacion = 0.01, n_arboles = 200)
d <- pca_outliers(d, n_comp = 2, percentil = 0.99)
d <- autoencoder_h2o(d, hidden = c(8,3,8), epochs = 100, percentil = 0.99)
d <- construir_validacion(d)

graficar_enandes(d, tipo = 3)
```

## Notes
- Dates must be "dd/mm/yyyy".
- Values numeric (mm for precipitation; Â°C for temperatures).
